long_description: The E-Case eSeries(TM) 13 case is sized to hold large smartphones, handheld game systems and other sensitive items. It offers protection when you're out in wet weather or on the water. Tough, completely transparent polyurethane windows are soft enough to let you view and use the touch screen without removing device from the case. PVC-free polyurethane material resists UV damage, so it remains transparent. SealLock(TM) closure meets IPX7 waterproof standards to withstand submersion down to 1m for 30 min. Die-cut lash points for tethering. Sized to fit a Samsung(R) Galaxy Note(R) smartphone, Galaxy Note(R) II smartphone, portable gaming systems and other valuables. Closeout.
short_description: The E-Case eSeries(TM) 13 case is sized to hold large smartphones, handheld game systems and other sensitive items. It offers protection when you're out in wet weather or on the water.
